lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: For, by this ring, the doctor lay with me.
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: NERISSA
lines.speaker: NERISSA

lines.value: And pardon me, my gentle Gratiano;
lines.speaker: NERISSA

lines.value: For that same scrubbed boy, the doctor's clerk,
lines.speaker: NERISSA

lines.value: In lieu of this last night did lie with me.
lines.speaker: NERISSA

lines.value: GRATIANO
lines.speaker: GRATIANO

lines.value: Why, this is like the mending of highways
lines.speaker: GRATIANO

lines.value: In summer, where the ways are fair enough:
lines.speaker: GRATIANO

lines.value: What, are we cuckolds ere we have deserved it?
lines.speaker: GRATIANO

lines.value: PORTIA
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: Speak not so grossly. You are all amazed:
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: Here is a letter; read it at your leisure;
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: It comes from Padua, from Bellario:
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: There you shall find that Portia was the doctor,
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: Nerissa there her clerk: Lorenzo here
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: Shall witness I set forth as soon as you
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: And even but now return'd; I have not yet
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: Enter'd my house. Antonio, you are welcome;
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: And I have better news in store for you
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: Than you expect: unseal this letter soon;
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: There you shall find three of your argosies
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: Are richly come to harbour suddenly:
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: You shall not know by what strange accident
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: I chanced on this letter.
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: ANTONIO
lines.speaker: ANTONIO

lines.value: I am dumb.
lines.speaker: ANTONIO

lines.value: BASSANIO
lines.speaker: BASSANIO

lines.value: Were you the doctor and I knew you not?
lines.speaker: BASSANIO

lines.value: GRATIANO
lines.speaker: GRATIANO

lines.value: Were you the clerk that is to make me cuckold?
lines.speaker: GRATIANO

lines.value: NERISSA
lines.speaker: NERISSA

lines.value: Ay, but the clerk that never means to do it,
lines.speaker: NERISSA

lines.value: Unless he live until he be a man.
lines.speaker: NERISSA

lines.value: BASSANIO
lines.speaker: BASSANIO

lines.value: Sweet doctor, you shall be my bed-fellow:
lines.speaker: BASSANIO

lines.value: When I am absent, then lie with my wife.
lines.speaker: BASSANIO

lines.value: ANTONIO
lines.speaker: ANTONIO

lines.value: Sweet lady, you have given me life and living;
lines.speaker: ANTONIO

lines.value: For here I read for certain that my ships
lines.speaker: ANTONIO

lines.value: Are safely come to road.
lines.speaker: ANTONIO

lines.value: PORTIA
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: How now, Lorenzo!
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: My clerk hath some good comforts too for you.
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: NERISSA
lines.speaker: NERISSA

lines.value: Ay, and I'll give them him without a fee.
lines.speaker: NERISSA

lines.value: There do I give to you and Jessica,
lines.speaker: NERISSA

lines.value: From the rich Jew, a special deed of gift,
lines.speaker: NERISSA

lines.value: After his death, of all he dies possess'd of.
lines.speaker: NERISSA

lines.value: LORENZO
lines.speaker: LORENZO

lines.value: Fair ladies, you drop manna in the way
lines.speaker: LORENZO

lines.value: Of starved people.
lines.speaker: LORENZO

lines.value: PORTIA
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: It is almost morning,
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: And yet I am sure you are not satisfied
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: Of these events at full. Let us go in;
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: And charge us there upon inter'gatories,
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: And we will answer all things faithfully.
lines.speaker: PORTIA

lines.value: GRATIANO
lines.speaker: GRATIANO

lines.value: Let it be so: the first inter'gatory
lines.speaker: GRATIANO

lines.value: That my Nerissa shall be sworn on is,
lines.speaker: GRATIANO

lines.value: Whether till the next night she had rather stay,
lines.speaker: GRATIANO

lines.value: Or go to bed now, being two hours to day:
lines.speaker: GRATIANO

lines.value: But were the day come, I should wish it dark,
lines.speaker: GRATIANO

lines.value: That I were couching with the doctor's clerk.
lines.speaker: GRATIANO

lines.value: Well, while I live I'll fear no other thing
lines.speaker: GRATIANO

lines.value: So sore as keeping safe Nerissa's ring.
lines.speaker: GRATIANO
